name: Coccyx, the Bone Thieving Wizard
description:
Play as the Barbarian and defeat Coccyx, the Bone Thieving Wizard, once and for all!

Play in browser with a mouse.

This game was made for the Goblin Bunker October 2021 Game Jam. The theme was "Something is missing"

FAQ:

Q: Am I missing something?

A: No.

Q: Is this really all there is?

A: Yes
